topic.title: ALK GENE FUSION STATUS (ANAPLASTIC LARGE CELL LYMPHOMA)
topic.shortdesc: ALK GENE FUSION STATUS (ANAPLASTIC LARGE CELL LYMPHOMA)Â is the status of the Anaplastic Lymphoma Kinase (ALK) Gene Fusion for Anaplastic Large Cell Lymphoma (ALCL) (a rare type of Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma (NHL)) during a Haematological Cancer Care Spell.
